hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#docker rmi --force shask/mysql:2.0
if [ -e $(docker ps -aq -f "name=mysql") ] then docker run --name="mysql" -d shask/mysql:2.0 fi
#Creating the environement to run build the webapp if [ -e $(docker ps -aq -f "name=jdk_mvn") ] then #No docker jdk, creating one docker create --name="jdk_mvn" --link="mysql:localhost" shask/jdk_mvn mvn clean install else if [ -e $(docker ps -f "name=jdk_mvn") ] #if there is a jdk_mvn container running close it then docker stop jdk_mvn fi fi docker cp . jdk_mvn:/. docker start -a jdk_mvn
#Copy of .war from docker jdk-mvn to jenkins docker cp jdk_mvn:/root/.m2/repository/com/excilys/computerdb/computerdb/0.6.0/computerdb-0.6.0.war computerdb.war
#Create tomcat docker and cp the webapp in it if [ -e $(docker ps -aq -f "name=computerdb-webapp") ] then echo No jdk_mvn tomcat running ... docker create --name="computerdb-webapp" --restart=no tomcat:8.0 else docker cp computerdb.war computerdb-webapp:usr/local/tomcat/webapps/computerdb.war docker commit computerdb-webapp shask/computerdb-webapp fi
#push the webapp on my hub docker push shask/computerdb-webapp
#bash /var/glazer-deploy.sh --host 192.168.10.225 --port 65000 --env MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=root mysql_deploy shask/mysql:2.0 #bash /var/glazer-deploy.sh --host 192.168.10.225 --port 65000 --link mysql:localhost --publish 65312:8080 shask-computerdb-webapp shask/computerdb-webapp
